Title: Bob & Carol & Ted Jr. & Alice
Writer: Ray McKinnon (created by), Ray McKinnon, Kate Powers (staff writer)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Daniel continues to adjust to group living which is further complicated by his new roommate. He expands his horizons by spending more time at the art co-op with Chloe. Meanwhile back in Paulie, Janet decides to plan a visit to Daniel.
